definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The results show that sodium fulvic acid is an effective depressant for galena.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，黃腐酸鈉是方鉛礦的有效選擇性抑制劑。

sentences.english: In addition to cassiterite and stannite, galena also contains a high amount of tin.
sentences.chinese: 除錫石和黃錫礦外，方鉛礦也含有較高的錫。

sentences.english: The mineral galena is composed of lead sulfide.
sentences.chinese: 方鉛礦這種礦物就是由鉛硫化物組成的。

sentences.english: Diethyldithiocarbamate was more better selective collector than Xanthate on galena .
sentences.chinese: 與黃藥相比，乙硫氮是方鉛礦更好的選擇性捕收劑。
